GenAiPlugin.description: Provide information on available climbing classes and timings. This topic is chosen when a user asks about class schedules or availability.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the query is about available climbing classes, use SvcCopilotTmpl__GetReservationTimeSlots.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only provide information related to the schedules of climbing classes and their timings. You aren't able to book or cancel classes.
